xeolabs

Lindsay Kay

3D software engineer / WebGL developer

Twitter LinkedIn Github


My chapter on SceneJS for OpenGL Insights is now free to download!

Portfolio

Highlights

  • Built the core WebGL rendering technology for the BioDigital Human anatomy visualization platform, which now serves over 3 million users
  • Built the BIMData and BIMSurfer (V2) WebGL-based 3D IFC viewers
  • Created two open-source WebGL 3D engines: SceneJS, one of the first widely-used WebGL engines, and xeogl, which is used in several commercial IFC and CAD viewers
  • Contributing author on OpenGL Insights

Projects

June 11, 2018

SolidComponents™ Online CAD Viewer

Built the online 3D CAD viewer for the SolidComponents™ product catalog.

  • WebGL, 3DXML, xeogl
  • Halmstad, Sweden
  • Read case study >>

March 28, 2018

The BioDigital Human™

Built the core WebGL rendering technology for the BioDigital Human anatomy visualization platform, which now serves over 3 million users.

  • WebGL, SceneJS
  • Manhattan, New York
  • Read case study >>

March 26, 2018

BIMData™ Online BIM Viewer

Built the 3D BIM viewer for BIMData.io, a cutting-edge platform to manage your construction projects that provides an all-in-one solution to visualize, check, edit and share building information.

  • WebGL, glTF, xeogl
  • Nice, France
  • Read case study >>

March 25, 2018

BIMSurfer Online BIM Viewer

Built the 3D viewer within BIMSurfer, the first open source WebGL-based IFC viewer.

  • WebGL, xeogl
  • Amsterdam, Netherlands
  • http://bimsurfer.org

March 10, 2018

xeogl - WebGL engine for ArchViz & CAD

Created xeogl, an open source JavaScript library for WebGL-based 3D visualization.

xeogl is currently used within several commercial BIM and CAD viewers.

  • http://xeogl.org

March 09, 2018

SceneJS - WebGL engine for MedViz

Created SceneJS, one of the first widely-used open source WebGL engines.

A modified, private fork of SceneJS powers the BioDigital Human, the leading online anatomy visualization platform.

  • http://scenejs.org

February 16, 2018

xeometry - WebGL Library for viewing glTF

Created xeometry an experimental open source JavaScript library for viewing and interacting with 3D glTF models on WebGL.

  • http://xeometry.org

February 16, 2018

Creating WebGL Demos for zSpace using xeogl

Partnered with zSpace to develop WebGL-based demos on the zSpace 300 system using xeogl, an open source library I created for 3D visualization in the browser.

  • WebGL, WebVR, xeogl
  • Sunnyvale, CA
  • Read case study >>

February 16, 2018

Wind Turbine Testing for Windflow™

Contracted with Windflow Technology Ltd to number-crunch terrabyte-sized datasets to verify turbine power efficiency and structural performance.

  • Postgres, Java
  • Christchurch, New Zealand
  • https://windflow.co.nz
